nodes.title: Rev up maven-hpi-plugin version to 2.0.1-SNAPHOT
Update hudson-plugin-parent.pom
Update hudson-test-harness
Fix for HUDSON-8856 to avoid NPE
Improve ChangeLog.Entry log
Resolve HUDSON-8857
Fix for HUDSON-3824 Per-project matrix authorization strategy isn't accurate for newly created projects
Fixed parent pom version in hudson-test-harness. Added junit, easymock, mockito and powermock dependencies into parent pom.
Resolve issue HUDSON-8853
Resolve HUDSON-5084
Resolve issue HUDSON-5336. Improve logic
Resolve HUDSON-4463
Fix for HUDSON-3935 Atom feed (and RSS?) doesn't contain description

Added configuration option in archive section which allows to disable gzip before the slave <-> master transfer. It may improve transfer performance in case of win slave and good channel between hosts.
Added a new test to check global properties are passed to Jobs, also adde

Resolve HUDSON-8446

Improved language
Updated UI tests to use junit instead of testNG. Added draft test to verify security.
Added configuration to disable CAPTCHA on user sign up.
Implement add JDK test case
Updated UI tests to work under different operation systems.
Added module for UI integration tests. Implemented UI tests for freestyle jobs (subversion, cvs, git plugins).

Resolve HUDSON-8807 (Delete slave has no dialog for confirmation)
Improve console icon on main page. Make it resizable
Resolve HUDSON-8806. Improve Help message
JDK automatic installer temporarily disabled because of NPE at hudson.tools.JDKInstaller.locateStage1(JDKInstaller.java:347). The reason is changed oracle JDK download page.
Revert changes from previous revision
Fixed HUDSON-4505 Build publishers run for aborted build

Fixed HUDSON-4605 (Builds aborted during SVN update are marked as FAILURE)
Resolve HUDSON-6629 (Cannot restart Hudson from the web frontend on OpenSolaris in VirtualBox)
Resolve HUDSON-5624. Merge changes from svn branch to github master
Updated versions of bundled cvs and git plugins, updated VersionNumber to process "_" delimited.
Resolve HUDSON-6692 (Timeline should use server's timezone, not GMT)

Resolve HUDSON-4791
Updated versions of bundled plugins, new plugins are available now in central maven repository.
Updated versions of bundled plugins.
Fixed HUDSON-8668 Initial position of Timeline "window" shows interval 1 day ahead of most recent build. Improved UI test.
Resolve HUDSON-7426
HUDSON-8895: alternative Maven 3 logo
HUDSON-8924: add help text for 'No Proxy for' option
HUDSON-8930: preserve empty properties and NONE ids, otherwise the UI will display defaults instead of the explicitly set values

Fix globalMessages population and displaying
Fixed maven-hpi-plugin version.
Resolve HUDSON-3924
Fix and improve node label chooser

Resolve HUDSON-4647
Update UI test to reflect latest sidepanel layout
Make sure MavenModuleSet's global translations use the updated key
HUDSON-8900: executors which have died with a cause of death shouldn't be considered as 'idle' since they can never accept any more work

M3cleanup
Resolve HUDSON-8815
Resolve HUDSON-8858
HUDSON-8859: merge in remaining core fixes/features from Sonatype's branch of Hudson

HUDSON-8894: support GWT in Hudson plugins
HUDSON-8891: bundle rest-plugin with hudson.war
HUDSON-8891: provide JAXB-based REST API and plugin
HUDSON-8859: Maven3 integration (model, eventspy, and slavebundle)

HUDSON-8889: JAXB compiler plugins
HUDSON-8888: add common, test, and plugin utility modules

Improve artifacts validation. Resolve HUDSON-7880
Introduce Hudson-test-framework
Even more configure tests
Disabled mvn invoking in UI tests.
Disabled JDKInstallerTest.
Disabled slow tests.
Updated pom to build hudson-test-harness 2.0.1.
Outgoing/updatejob
Increased surefire timeout.
Fixed a few tests.
Disabled broken tests.
Debian package improvements
Fixed CRLF and unicode literals to hopefully make merges easier in the future
Fixed a few tests, pom cleanup.
M3label
Fix issue with Build Steps drop down: was incorrectly marked as overridden in some cases
Set 'None' as initial value for the cascading drop down
Clean-up job class. Use set of get*Properties methods from CascadingUtil
Cascading for publishers and buildWrappers
Introduce CascadingUtil class. Move cascading logic to utils
Updated version of bundled SCM plugins.
Enabled fork mode for maven-surefire-plugin, fixed broken listScmBrowsers.
Enabled fork mode for maven-surefire-plugin.
Disable ajax caching for cascading children list during delete process (IE hook)
Added tests.
Unlink child on job delete
Implement recursive filtering for List of cascading candidates
Implement recursive filtering for List of cascading candidates
Implement unit-tests for link/unlink cascading projects. Improve deleteConfirmation dialog. Doesn't allow to delete project with cascading children
Implement method for unlinking cascading project from parents. Improve linkCascadingProject method
Added linkCascadingProjectsToChild method.
Added cascadingChildrenNames set and appropriate methods.
Small fixes, updated copyright section.
Improved ru properties, help messages. Fixed UI for the concurrentBuild cascading property rendering.
Disable cascading JS for tests. Fix DescribableListProperty (when getDefaultValue was called - result was not used for such Property. All values were missed)
doResetProjectProperty method was relocated to Job class.
Update JavaDocs for PP. Implement unit-tests for ExternalProjectProperty
Upgrade to sisu 2.3.0 and guava 10.0.1
Improve describableListProperty. Return default value if current value is null
Refine isModified logic. Use this field only for special ProjectProperty that will be the wrapper for Publishers, BuilWrappers and other classes without correctly implemented equals methods.
A few fixes related to cascading UI
Improve doModifyProperty method. Add ability to pass properties with name template: 'has'

Introduce returnOriginalValue method for PP class. Add ability to override this method in subclasses in order to provide flexible mechanism of value handling. Increase test coverage. Implement test class for DescribableListUtil class
Add isModified field for LogRotator property logic
Avoid caching of css and js custom resources. Add hudson version to css and js refs
Improved JS script to highlight SCM config pages in case of cascading overriding.
Introduce isModified field in order to trigger Property changes from UI. Implement workaround for equals methods absence
Improve UI and backend for ProjectProperties handling
Merged changes from master branch.
Fix cascading project issues
Increase visibility for allowOverrideValue method. Move this method to IProjectProperty interface
Fixed dependencies scope.
Fixed issue with revert button rendering in IE.
Move revert buttons to the left
Dublicate code was removed from Project and MatrixProject. BaseBuildableProject was introduced.
Added equals and hashcode for MavenBuilder
HUDSON-9024: improve detection of Maven version
Added cascading for project SCM.
Cascading Publishers for Freestyle project
Updated versions of subversion and cvs plugins.
Improve BaseProjectProperty
HUDSON-9027: add maven-utplsql-plugin to the legacy list of plugins producing surefire results
HUDSON-9024: attempt to detect Maven3 version from maven-core build.properties before falling back to scraping version output
HUDSON-9022: use dynamic locator to search for EventSpy delegates, rather than assume the current injector contains it
Rev-up XSTREAM library
Project version was changed to 2.2.0-SNAPSHOT to avoid conflicts with the master branch.
Added cobertura plugin.
Updated builders, publishers and build wrappers in the Matrix project. Updated bundled plugins.
Fixed broken Ant automatic installator.
Fixed hudson-test-harness tests.
Updated bundled git plugin.
Updated bounded plugins to the latest version.
Use 1.167 stapler-jelly.
Improve fix for Hudson-8209: allow to use '.' only in {} brakets
Returned back 1.5 maven-stapler-plugin because of backward compatibility issues. Used 1.165 stapler-jelly.
Remove duplicated json-lib library
Fix HUDSON-8997 (Display node description when hovering on the node name)
Add ready message
HUDSON-9001: Consistency, we only need to fix the akuma dependency
Upgraded stapler, maven-stapler-plugin. Fixed HUDSON-9002, HUDSON-9003. Partially fixed http://java.net/jira/browse/STAPLER-14
Handle plugin descriptors containing "null" string values
HUDSON-9012: recover from mismatch between container and REST plugin versions of Jersey; support initialization of REST servlet after the onLoad event
HUDSON-8951: fix potential concurrency issue when recording/committing artifacts
HUDSON-8951: log warning instead of throwing exception when recording null artifacts
HUDSON-9001: NPE when starting Hudson 2.1.1 with --daemon
Add legacy commons-digester and commons-lang dependencies for backward compatibility
Resolve HUDSON-8998 (In a multi-configuration job expanding a second user defined axis to multi line doesn't work)
Fix commons-lang3 usage for hudson-maven and hudson-plugin-utils
Rev-up major versions of 3rd party libraries
Resolve HUDSON-9011 (Javascript bugs in Hudson Version 2.1.1 using Internet Explorer 8)
Rev-up major version for 3rd party hudson libs
Revert changes for HUDSON-8579 ("Build now" link text not the best wording)
Fix HUDSON-4040 (Autocomplete "Projects to build" under "Post-build Actions")
HUDSON-7806: Button to bring slave back online should be reworded
Fix HUDSON-8579 ("Build now" link text not the best wording). Use "Execute Now" instead
Androidreport
Resolve HUDSON-8209 (Update hudson.Util.VARIABLE to support variable names with a '.' in them)
Fix HUDSON-6290 (Add a 'New View' link in the sidebar of Hudson)
Increase visibility for BuildTImelineWindget class. Make it accessible via reflection
Fix HUDSON-6230 (Display job-description also on parameters page when starting a parametrized job)
Fix HUDSON-6099 (Add cancel all UI element to Build Queue table)
Resolve HUDSON-5818. Improve hudson-core.pom
Patched json-lib library was replaced with the latest 2.4, added missed getters in the classes to save Gson backward compatibility.
Fix HUDSON-8044 (displaying line.separator without any quoting doesn't make sense)
Resolve HUDSON-7926 (Add time execution of the build on build detail page)
Fix HUDSON-9004
Improve versions handling for plugins and libraries.
Replaced gmaven-plugin ver.1.0-rc-5-patch-2 with ver. 1.3. Upgraded groovy version to 1.8.1.
Remove forked libraries
Resolve HUDSON-8808
HUDSON-8992: only persist the watched-dependencies-property if the project has enabled the Maven3 snapshot trigger
Resolve HUDSON-7426
Resolve HUDSON-7426
Merge fixed and improvements from master branch to eclipse-move
Resolve HUDSON-8883 (Wrong build history order)
Bump logback-classic from 0.9.28 to 1.2.0
Bump commons-io from 2.0.1 to 2.7
Bump ant from 1.8.2 to 1.10.9
Bump ant from 1.8.2 to 1.9.15
Bump commons-collections from 3.2 to 3.2.2 in /hudson-core
Bump commons-beanutils from 1.8.0 to 1.9.2 in /hudson-core
Bump spring.version from 2.5 to 5.2.1.RELEASE in /hudson-core
Avoid accidental unlink of cascading parent when security is enabled
Use latest hudson releases of stapler, plus some additional escaping of the 'from' login parameter
Enable escaping by default in core jelly files
Fixed 'Restart when no job is running' button. Resolve issue HUDSON-9025.
Improved fix for Hudson-9023 (Display job description when hovering on job in list of build jobs), added processing of HTML tags.
A few fixes
Fixed issue with incorrect link on the custom view configuration page
Fixed Bug 363652 - Handle unable to delete workspace more gracefully
Fixed HUDSON-8999 Modal dialog for deleting an individual build from a job build history
Fixed HUDSON-9069 Matrix jobs become concurrent when more then two jobs are queued up
Revved up version of bundled rest-plugin.
Updated version of maven-plugin.
Fixed HUDSON-9101 (When searching with empty string, http error 404 shown)
Resolve issue Hudson-9095
Updated versions of rest-plugin, maven-plugin, hudson-war, hudson-core, hudson-test-framework.version in hudson-plugin-parent pom
Use 1.6 stapler-plugin
Force save if cascading parent changed
Fixed HUDSON-9089 CLI causing parameters to get dropped.
Use staged 2.2.0 release of maven-plugin, maven3-plugin, and maven3-snapshots
Resolve HUDSON-9085
Resolve issue Hudson-9079
Revved subversion plugin version to 2.2.0_1
Resolve issue Hudson-9084
Resolve issue Hudson-9078
Resolve issue Hudson-9078

Resolve Hudson-9077
Move public method to intefaces for Job hierarchy.
Specified default hudson url.
Block deleting external job if it has cascading children. Introduce cascadingJobDeleteForm.jelly tag
Improved help message for "Project Relationship" search feature.
Add null check for Describable#toMap method. Avoid NPE and fix HUDSON-9067
Resolve HUDSON-9072 (500 Exception adding a slave axis to a matrix build in IE8): Fix IE JS specific name attribute handling. Small javaDoc fix.
SetCascadingProjectName method should be called from Job class during submit
Draft implementation of cascadable JobProperties. Improve highlighting for modified elements
Resolve HUDSON-8176 (Matrix Projects variables do not Escaped properly the / character in the URL)
Used DeepEquals for the properties comparison. It resolves the issue in some tier2 plugins with properties highlighting as overridden if no changes was made.
Job configuration should be saved after changing cascading children
Improve SCM cascading handling. Clean-up code
Improved help message for "Project Relationship" search feature
Fixed link to wiki
HUDSON-9040: discard unwanted AspectJ trace output from custom WeavingURLClassLoader
HUDSON-9040: discard unwanted AspectJ trace output from custom WeavingURLClassLoader
Reset triggers while removing cascading project parent
Fix Exception while evaluation jelly expression for ChangeLogSet
Fix triggers logic. Call #updateTransientActions() on trigger add/remove
A few fixes
Improve cascading functionality. Avoid redundant project saving while working with describableList.
Resolve Potential ClassCastException for triggers functionality
Resolve HUDSON-7046 (Block Build when downstream project is building - No UI for matrix build)
FIxed HUDSON-8938 (Option to notify user of Hudson account creation); refactored MailSender; improved mailing templates
Optimize cascading.js. Bind onChange handler only for configuration page
Remove LegacyAuthorizationStrategy from UI. Resolve HUDSON-8944
FIxed HUDSON-8896 - Useless stacktraces reported on XML unmarshall problems.
Added unit tests.
Apply pmd plugin for hudson-core. Resolve issues with unused imports...
Fixed incorrect overridden setting.

Introduce set of ProjectProperties tests based on ProjectPropertyTest.class. Implement test cases for CopyOnWriteListProperty, BaseProjectProperty, DescribableListProjectProperty, ExternalProjectProperty
Fixed ClassCastException.
HUDSON-9064: avoid UnsupportedOperationException on JBoss5
Add Null check during setting parameterDefinition on Job load
Fix ProjectPropery comparision logic. Include transient fields. Fix unit-test for AxisListProperty#allowOverride method
Fixed AxisList comparison
Move legacy scm conversion to separate method. Apply 'original' css style for non-cascadable nested.tag
Changed generic of BaseBuildableProject to save backward compatibility with publishers
Fixed highlighting of the parameters in case of cascading overriding.
Fix NPE on job load. Add null checks for cascading children
Implement unit-test for conversion legacy properties
Fix NPE on job load
Fixed NPE.
Implement cascading functionality for Build Parameters
Improve cascadingDescriptorList tag. Improve TriggerProjectProperty
Added cascading for "Restrict where this project can be run"
addPublisher/removePublisher methods were relocated to BaseBuildableProejct.
Fix broken trigger test
Added mockito-core dependency to plugin-parent
Refine BasePP class in order to provide better flexibility in resetting original value for subclasses
Improve equals/hashCode tests for ParameterDefinition subclasses
Implement equals/hashcode for ParameterDefinition subclasses. Add unit tests for new logic
Integrated changes from 'template_project' branch.
Improve upstream/downstream triggers handling for cascading functionality. Add additional validation for triggers recursion
Fixed NPE (if the node on which the job previously had been built was not available)
Bundle released versions of maven-plugin, maven3-plugin, and rest-plugin
Move JAXB and GWT support to separate repositories
Move maven3 and rest support to separate repositories
Improved highlighting and help messages for the triggers.
Save upstream triggers after submitting configuration page
HUDSON-8935: fix plugin wiki urls
Extract legacy-maven-plugin to its own repository
Synchronize guava-gwt version with main guava version

Implement test for legacy triggers conversion
